channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 5-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and father return to Minnesota from ICE facility in Texas
item.description: Five-year-old Liam Conejo Ramos and his father have returned to Minnesota after being released by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement

item.title: More frigid temperatures expected in much of US after a weekend of heavy snow
item.description: Forecasters warned that dangerous extra-cold conditions will persist for a huge swath of the U.S. from the Gulf Coast into New England

item.title: Speaker Johnson faces tough choices as partial government shutdown drags and debate over ICE deepens
item.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson faces tough days ahead trying to pass a federal funding package and prevent a prolonged partial government shutdown

item.title: Kennedy Center to close for 2 years for renovations in July, Trump says, after performers' backlash
item.description: President Donald Trump says he will move to close Washingtonâ€™s Kennedy Center performing arts venue for two years starting in July for construction

item.title: Groundhog Day puts Punxsutawney Phil's forecast about winter's length in spotlight
item.description: Punxsutawney Phil's handlers will be announcing if the weather-predicting groundhog sees his shadow
